title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project availability issue
description: Bug 2529 - In the Navigator, the option to close a project is not always available. Currently, when selecting both P1 and P2 projects, the issue persists.
OB: When multiple projects are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not visible or accessible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create two projects: P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close project P2 and observe if the Close Project option is available.
